definition: a loosely woven cord (in a candle or oil lamp) that draws fuel by capillary action up into the flame
details:
noun
- a loosely woven cord (in a candle or oil lamp) that draws fuel by capillary action up into the flame
= synonyms: taper
- any piece of cord that conveys liquid by capillary action
= example: any piece of cord that conveys liquid by capillary action
